name: Pharoahs Tomb
description: Pharoahs Tomb is a 1st person perspective arcade adventure where you must explore the tomb of a Pharoah collecting gold and other treasures. As you move around the tomb you will encounter arcade elements and puzzles to solve to progress. The arcade elements has the screen full of various types of treasure and you must move a cursor to collect as much as you can in a short space of time. The puzzle elements has you trying to solve words that are mixed up and guessing 4-digit numbers based on the game Mastermind where the computer tells you which numbers are correct and which ones are in the wrong place. You will also encounter many creatures and monsters which can be moved away from or fought which needs weapons that can be brought at anytime but require gold.
